output_list.code: function mintToken(address target, uint256 mintedAmount) onlyOwner public {
output_list.reason: The mintToken function is designed to mint more tokens to a specified address. However, it does not contain any conditions to prevent the minting of more tokens than the initial supply. This could lead to the token devaluing, as the total supply will be more than the initial supply. The attacker can mint more tokens than the initial supply, and the total supply will be more than the initial supply. The attacker can then sell the tokens at a loss.
